DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate novel , combination product treatment acne vulgaris female
DOC.brief_title: A Novel Combination Oral Agent Treat Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Healthy females 13 year age old Nonpregnant , nonlactating female Signed write informed consent form Must able understand willing follow study instruction Have clinical diagnosis acne vulgaris Female subject pregnant nursing Any concomitant dermatologic condition may affect outcome measure Concurrent use medication treat acne vulgaris Have history clinical evidence active acute chronic medical disease condition consider principal investigator unsuitable study Are currently use investigational agent device Have participate clinical study within 90 day prior enrollment Employees family member sponsor research site
